content: now have 2 loops continue in this manner one at a time through all of your chain stitches you will have 20 loops when you are done with this row knitting the row - 20 stitches in each row note knit on the front side only row 1 - knitting from left to right pull the yarn from back to front of each loop row 2 - knitting from right to left pull the yarn from back to front of each loop
